1.1.6 Home Visits to Mother in PNC period:
1.1.6.1 CHO should visit all the PNC womenâ€™s home within 48 hours of birth, and on 3rd, 7th, 14th, 28th 
and 42nd day of pregnancy. 
1.1.6.2 In this visit, the CHO should do a thorough examination of the PNC women as per guidelines and do 
proper reporting in the formats.
